verses.verse: Come near <WH7126> <WH8798>, ye nations <WH1471>, to hear <WH8085> <WH8800>; and hearken <WH7181> <WH8685>, ye people <WH3816>: let the earth <WH776> hear <WH8085> <WH8799>, and all that is therein <WH4393>; the world <WH8398>, and all things that come forth <WH6631> of it.

For the indignation <WH7110> of the YY <WH3068> is upon all nations <WH1471>, and his fury <WH2534> upon all their armies <WH6635>: he hath utterly destroyed <WH2763> <WH8689> them, he hath delivered <WH5414> <WH8804> them to the slaughter <WH2874>.

Their slain <WH2491> also shall be cast out <WH7993> <WH8714>, and their stink <WH889> shall come up <WH5927> <WH8799> out of their carcases <WH6297>, and the mountains <WH2022> shall be melted <WH4549> <WH8738> with their blood <WH1818>.

And all the host <WH6635> of heaven <WH8064> shall be dissolved <WH4743> <WH8738>, and the heavens <WH8064> shall be rolled together <WH1556> <WH8738> as a scroll <WH5612>: and all their host <WH6635> shall fall down <WH5034> <WH8799>, as the leaf <WH5929> falleth off <WH5034> <WH8800> from the vine <WH1612>, and as a falling <WH5034> <WH8802> fig from the fig tree <WH8384>.

For my sword <WH2719> shall be bathed <WH7301> <WH8765> in heaven <WH8064>: behold, it shall come down <WH3381> <WH8799> upon Idumea <WH123>, and upon the people <WH5971> of my curse <WH2764>, to judgment <WH4941>.

The sword <WH2719> of the YY <WH3068> is filled <WH4390> <WH8804> with blood <WH1818>, it is made fat <WH1878> <WH8719> with fatness <WH2459>, and with the blood <WH1818> of lambs <WH3733> and goats <WH6260>, with the fat <WH2459> of the kidneys <WH3629> of rams <WH352>: for the YY <WH3068> hath a sacrifice <WH2077> in Bozrah <WH1224>, and a great <WH1419> slaughter <WH2874> in the land <WH776> of Idumea <WH123>.

And the unicorns <WH7214> shall come down <WH3381> <WH8804> with them, and the bullocks <WH6499> with the bulls <WH47>; and their land <WH776> shall be soaked <WH7301> <WH8765> with blood <WH1818>, and their dust <WH6083> made fat <WH1878> <WH8792> with fatness <WH2459>.
For it is the day <WH3117> of the YY'S <WH3068> vengeance <WH5359>, and the year <WH8141> of recompences <WH7966> for the controversy <WH7379> of TZiyon <WH6726>.

And the streams <WH5158> thereof shall be turned <WH2015> <WH8738> into pitch <WH2203>, and the dust <WH6083> thereof into brimstone <WH1614>, and the land <WH776> thereof shall become burning <WH1197> <WH8802> pitch <WH2203>.

It shall not be quenched <WH3518> <WH8799> night <WH3915> nor day <WH3119>; the smoke <WH6227> thereof shall go up <WH5927> <WH8799> for ever <WH5769>: from generation <WH1755> to generation <WH1755> it shall lie waste <WH2717> <WH8799>; none shall pass through <WH5674> <WH8802> it for ever <WH5331> and ever <WH5331>.

But the cormorant <WH6893> and the bittern <WH7090> shall possess <WH3423> <WH8804> it; the owl <WH3244> also and the raven <WH6158> shall dwell <WH7931> <WH8799> in it: and he shall stretch out <WH5186> <WH8804> upon it the line <WH6957> of confusion <WH8414>, and the stones <WH68> of emptiness <WH922>.
They shall call <WH7121> <WH8799> the nobles <WH2715> thereof to the kingdom <WH4410>, but none shall be there, and all her princes <WH8269> shall be nothing <WH657>.

And tshofars <WH5518> shall come up <WH5927> <WH8804> in her palaces <WH759>, nettles <WH7057> and brambles <WH2336> in the fortresses <WH4013> thereof: and it shall be an habitation <WH5116> of dragons <WH8577>, and a court <WH2681> for owls <WH1323> <WH3284>.

The wild beasts of the desert <WH6728> shall also meet <WH6298> <WH8804> with the wild beasts of the island <WH338>, and the satyr <WH8163> shall cry <WH7121> <WH8799> to his fellow <WH7453>; the screech owl <WH3917> also shall rest <WH7280> <WH8689> there, and find <WH4672> <WH8804> for herself a place of rest <WH4494>.

There shall the great owl <WH7091> make her nest <WH7077> <WH8765>, and lay <WH4422> <WH8762>, and hatch <WH1234> <WH8804>, and gather <WH1716> <WH8804> under her shadow <WH6738>: there shall the vultures <WH1772> also be gathered <WH6908> <WH8738>, every one <WH802> with her mate <WH7468>.

Seek ye out <WH1875> <WH8798> of the book <WH5612> of the YY <WH3068>, and read <WH7121> <WH8798>: no one <WH259> of these <WH2007> shall fail <WH5737> <WH8738>, none <WH802> shall want <WH6485> <WH8804> her mate <WH7468>: for my mouth <WH6310> it hath commanded <WH6680> <WH8765>, and his spirit <WH7307> it hath gathered <WH6908> <WH8765> them.

And he hath cast <WH5307> <WH8689> the lot <WH1486> for them, and his hand <WH3027> hath divided <WH2505> <WH8765> it unto them by line <WH6957>: they shall possess <WH3423> <WH8799> it for <WH5704> ever <WH5769>, from generation <WH1755> to generation <WH1755> shall they dwell <WH7931> <WH8799> therein.
